Name: So So Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of float (dehydrated) apple slice.
Review: This beautifully balanced, delicately herbal cocktail is so much more than just so-so.
History: The "So So Cocktail" appears in Harry MacElhone's 's 1923 Harry of Ciro's ABC Of Mixing Cocktails where he credits this drink to " Mr P. Soso, the popular manager of Kit-Kat Club, London. "
Nutrition: One serving of So So Cocktail contains 164 calories
